message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is an exceptional value considering its worth to you is $15,000. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I believe this is still a fair deal for both of us, considering your own valuation and my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. This allows some room for both of us to feel satisfied with the transaction.
